body: a girl who did it with an unknown person who just confessed to her, much less accept his confession and during highschool too. whats more if she can accept childhood friend that fast and even remember his confession during little, hoped he said it to her, means she does have feelings for him.... but she chickened up, proceed to accept stranger's confession. Didn't try to make it up to a homie or reconcile with him, when she put aside their plans that they do every year, or even have the courtesy invite him to go together to the festival when they are adults. Bad friend indeed, confessing is not even to be consider. All in all quite illogical, if u make her an airhead, i guess she is oblivious to her childhood's friend feelings even though it is that obvious, but the last scene she just spot on guessed his childhood friend wanting to have sex....
難得看到一個NTR結局能讓人滿意的
And thus lord saviour truck-kun saving the day.
两个心软的人，必然得有一次勇敢的飞跃，才能生活在一起。
好個美好的結局真的是太好了，嗚嗚嗚！但從夢裡看來，女的好像也不是甚麼好東西？
翻譯的很好，還有這結局我喜歡(≧▽≦)

There's a summary in the jp version it's basically guy watching his childhoodfriend get taken away by some other guy who confessed to her first and they drift apart years later they meet again and when he runs after her he dies or goes back in time or it was all a dream and thinking back on it he  doesn't want that to happen so he confesses this time before that other guy.
I can't read Chinese so can someone sum this up for me
